column4: is there anyone that cna help me kill my current (unknown) window manager so i can run openbox using this tutorial? http://icculus.org/openbox/index.php/Help:XFCE/Openbox I dont want to logout and login to openbox using the session manager because it has to be XFCE/OpenBox
What goes wrong when you type killall xfwm4
It say that xfwm4: no process killed
what does ps | grep xfwm show?
If you followed the directions you pasted, it would have killed your WM then replaced it with openbox. Have you checked to see if openbox is already running?
I i dont know how to do that
so i cant run compiz with openbox?
ok i did killall compiz ; openbox & exit and now - http://pastebin.com/m48206aa0
Well, I don't see compiz, but I don't see openbox either. You desktop must look messed up.
might emerald be my window manager?

Dunno, anyway know the instructions say "Now you must log out and log back in. When you go to log out, make sure you check the box that says "Save session for future login" or something like that. When you log back in, XFCE will use Openbox."
Why are you still here? You did step one of the instructions and it seemed to work. Now do step two. Log out, save session for future login. Log back in. We'll still be here
